Package net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.color

package net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.color
Provides classes used to manage Color.

    HSLColor
    Taken from http://www.camick.com/java/source/HSLColor.java The HSLColor class provides methods to manipulate HSL (Hue, Saturation Luminance) values to create a corresponding Color object using the RGB ColorSpace.
